column1: #text=I buy tickets far ahead , to save money .
#text=When the day approaches , I pack carefully , excluding oversized toiletries , liquids , explosives and anything else likely to be viewed as contraband .
#text=I also remind myself not to joke about this stuff at the airport , and to be absolutely cooperative .
#text=I wear slip-on shoes , arrive an hour early , get in line and do as I am told .
#text=Usually this means a brief scan and luggage overlook .
#text=It 's much like crossing a border , and only slightly more intense .
#text=Then I wait on the other side of the checkpoint , with everyone else .
#text=I am careful to bring snacks and slippers in my carry on luggage , and I read rather than paying for entertainment .
#text=The flying etiquette of Coach class is to leave fellow passengers alone , and I do that .
#text=I also avoid those tiny bathrooms if I can , because I feel confined enough just being on the plane .
